headline: American Express Announces 2025 Preliminary Stress Capital Buffer Requirement
summary: NEW YORK, July 01, 2025--American Express Company (NYSE: AXP) today announced that the Federal Reserve set the company’s preliminary Stress Capital Buffer ("SCB") requirement at 2.5 percent, effective October 1, 2025 through September 30, 2026, based on the results of the 2025 Comprehensive Capital Analysis and Review process. This is the minimum SCB requirement under the applicable regulations and is consistent with American Express’ previously disclosed SCB in effect through September 30, 2025

This is the minimum SCB requirement under the applicable regulations and is consistent with American Express’ previously disclosed SCB in effect through September 30, 2025

headline: CEO Spends 1.83 Million Amex Points to Pay Surprise Tariff Bill
